item.title: Katie add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Katie add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Katie add a quote by Bessie Anderson Stanley
Katie add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Katie add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "When it is dark enough, you can see the stars." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Katie add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "What you do speaks so loudly that I cannot hear what you say." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Katie add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Katie add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "The ornament of a house is the friends who frequent it." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Katie add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "In my walks, every man I meet is my superior in some way, and in that I learn from him." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Katie add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Katie add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Make the most of yourself....for that is all there is of you." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Katie add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "All I have seen teaches me to trust the Creator for all I have not seen." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Katie add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Cultivate the habit of being grateful for every good thing that comes to you, and to give thanks continuously. And because all things have contributed to your advancement, you should include all things in your gratitude." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Katie add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Peace cannot be achieved through violence, it can only be attained through understanding." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Katie add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Nothing is at last sacred but the integrity of your own mind." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Katie add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Nothing great was ever achieved without enthusiasm." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Katie add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Our greatest glory is not in never failing, but in rising up every time we fail." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Katie add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "That which we persist in doing becomes easier to do, not that the nature of the thing has changed but that our power to do has increased." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Katie add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "You cannot do a kindness too soon, for you never know how soon it will be too late." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson
